column3: One of the luminaries of Ul'dah was once that which the blood-drunk call a gladiator, and lo, this Raubahn wears a bull's head.
By that bull's head, I mark him as an ally likely! For lo, the wearer of a horse's head and the wearer of a bull's head are more alike than one with no head to wear at all!
I mark that you wear no head, alack! Where is the uma kabuto that is your badge of honor in Ul'dah?
A kabuto astray is no great matter! Take another and lo, know that in places least expected will you find the greatest allies!
